snippet: Jhonny Peralta’s sacrifice fly in the eighth inning broke a 1-1 tie, and Carlos Martinez threw six and two-thirds innings for St. Louis.
abstract: Baseball Roundup; St. Louis Cardinals beat San Diego Padres, 2-1; other MLB scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Jhonny Peralta’s sacrifice fly in the eighth inning broke a 1-1 tie, and Carlos Martinez threw six and two-thirds innings for St. Louis.

headline.print_headline: Mauer Goes 4 for 5 With a Two-Run Homer as the Twins Jump on the Royals Early
headline.main: In Defeating Padres, Cardinals Halt Their Longest Skid of the Season at 4 Games
